translations: 女子气质，女性本性；温柔，柔弱；女性

sentences.sentence: I wonder if there isn't a streak of femininity in him, a kind of sweetness.
sentences.translation: 我想知道他身上是否没有一丝女性气质，一种温柔。

sentences.sentence: His initial work found that cultures differ in four dimensions, one of which was masculinity-femininity.
sentences.translation: 他的最初工作发现文化在四个方面有所不同，其中之一是男性气质-女性气质。

sentences.sentence: There was already more than enough femininity in his life.
sentences.translation: 他的生命已经具备了够充足的女性成份。
